rows.label: qst104209_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, hello again!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0002
rows.name:
Would you listen to this?
My book was a smashing success!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0011
rows.name:
I released a companion volume to help
sell my original book about flowers.
What do you think it was about?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0012
rows.name:
No, not dashing gentlemen, actually.
I wrote a story about beautiful ladies
based on all the different flowers!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0013
rows.name:
It was a huge hit with male readers.
We just can't publish enough copies
to meet demand!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0021
rows.name:
A riveting tale of elegant gentlemen and
the passionate friendships they share...

rows.label: qst104209_msg0022
rows.name:
That's what everyone's calling it!
The female reader base just can't
get enough of the heated drama!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0031
rows.name:
People have started asking me when
I'm going to bring out a sequel...

rows.label: qst104209_msg0032
rows.name:
A certain mental state is required to
create. But I still want to espouse the
joys of the written word to the world!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0033
rows.name:
Oh, you're recruiting a language
teacher for a school in Iyasaki Village?
That sounds fabulous!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0034
rows.name:
It's so important to immerse yourself
in beautiful literature from a young age!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0035
rows.name:
I'd make sure all my pupils grow up
into the kind of people who can fall
madly in love with fictional characters!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0036
rows.name:
Oh, but are you sure?
Me, a teacher?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0051
rows.name: Invite Mesulia to teach in Iyasaki?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0052
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: qst104209_msg0053
rows.name: Think it over

rows.label: qst104209_msg0061
rows.name:
All right, then! I'll do my best
to teach those kids good!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0062
rows.name:
I guess I'd better head home right
away and start preparing to leave!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0063
rows.name:
I might be a little late arriving, I have
to gather up all the novels I might be
able to use as textbooks!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0081
rows.name:
Oh, OK then...
Well, I'm always willing if you
don't find anyone else!

rows.label: qst104209_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh, did you make your mind up
about the language teacher thing?

rows.label: qst104209_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you make your mind up about that
language teacher thing? Oh, you found
someone else? Shame, shame...

rows.label: qst104209_msg0301
rows.name:
Naturally, I want to surpass my last
work, but the pressure is burdensome
and the blank page terrifies me.
